item.title: 「Big Brother Ma」 Huang Li Cheng's Multi-Long Positions Face Unrealized Losses Exceeding $10 Million
item.description: August 19th. As per on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng currently holds long positions in BTC, ETH, HYPE, and PUMP, with a total unrealized loss of 10.35 million US dollars.Currently, the liquidation price of his ETH long position is $3081, and he has adjusted the take-profit and stop-loss range to between $4242 and $4800.

item.title: Two institution-associated addresses bought a total of 9,044 ETH, approximately $38 million.
item.description: On August 19th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, despite the downturn in the market, institutions are still actively purchasing ETH.Twenty-five minutes ago, two wallet addresses related to institutions received 9044 ETH (approximately $38 million) from FalconX.

item.title: The crypto market is experiencing a widespread decline, with a total of $291 million in long liquidations across the network in the past 24 hours.
item.description: On August 19th, according to CoinGecko data, the cryptocurrency market is experiencing a general decline today. The total market capitalization has dropped to $3.916 trillion, with a 24-hour decrease of 1.5%.Coinglass data indicates that in the past 24 hours, there have been liquidations amounting to $378 million across the entire network. The long liquidations are $291 million, and the short liquidations are $86.48 million.

item.title: The Whale Long Position of "Longing ETH with 125k USD Leveraged Position" Liquidated with Only $10 Remaining Space
item.description: On August 19th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "125k USD Long ETH Liquidation" whale has decreased its position by 5634.08 ETH at two addresses and incurred a loss of 830k USD. Today, it has been forced to liquidate an additional 11,585.13 ETH, and the latest liquidation price is 4159 USD.According to HTX market data, Ethereum once dropped to 4169.42 USD and is now rebounding above 4200 USD, with a 24-hour decline of 2.37%.

item.title: Three Whale Addresses Triggered Panic Selling of Over 34,400 ETH, Approximately $148 Million
item.description: On August 19th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, with the market plummeting, multiple whale addresses are in a state of panic and selling ETH.An hour ago, the address starting with 0x1D8d deposited 17,972 ETH into Coinbase (approximately $77.4 million);In the past 12 minutes, the address starting with 0x5A8E deposited 13,521 ETH into Binance (approximately $57.72 million);20 minutes ago, the address starting with 0x3684 deposited 3,003 ETH into Binance (approximately $12.89 million).

item.title: Suspected FBG Capital Address Transfers 16,524 ETH to Binance, Unrealized Gain of $7.98 Million
item.description: On August 19th, according to Chain.info, a particular whale/institution (with an Arkham Tag suspected to be FBG Capital) transferred 16,524 ETH (approximately $70.6 million) to Binance within the past 30 minutes. If sold, it could potentially make a profit of $7.98 million.

item.title: 「$125,000 Leveraged Long on ETH Liquidated」 - Whale Long on ETH Currently Facing Unrealized Loss of Over $3,350,000
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain data, the "whale with a $125,000 long position in ETH liquidation" is currently experiencing a loss of $2.675 million on a 15-times leveraged long ETH position and a loss of $678,000 on a 25-times leveraged long ETH position, with a total loss of $3.353 million.

item.title: SEC Chair: Will Participate in Project Crypt Furnace Fireside Chat at SALT Wyoming Blockchain Event
item.description: On August 19th, Paul Atkins, who is the Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), declared that he is going to take part in a fireside chat regarding Project Crypto at the SALT Wyoming Blockchain Seminar today.Note: SALT is a global investment platform that establishes a connection between institutional asset owners and asset managers as well as technology entrepreneurs.

item.title: The US stock market continues to decline, with the Nasdaq index falling by 1%.
item.description: On August 19th, based on market data, the US stock market continued to decline. The Nasdaq index dropped by 1.00%.

item.title: Trump's son, through his holding company Thumzup, is seeking to acquire the mining firm Dogehash.
item.description: August 19th: As per The Block, Thumzup (Nasdaq: TZUP) is set to acquire Dogehash Technologies in an all-stock transaction. This acquisition seems to be one of Thumzup's initiatives towards a novel direction in cryptocurrency mining.Dogehash is an industrial-scale blockchain mining firm that concentrates on the Scrypt algorithm employed by Dogecoin and Litecoin. According to the terms of the agreement, Dogehash shareholders will exchange all their held shares for 30.7 million shares of Thumzup stock. The company will be rebranded as "Dogehash Technologies Holdings, Inc." and will be traded on Nasdaq under the new ticker symbol "XDOG." The deal is anticipated to be completed by the end of this year.Note: Donald Trump Jr., the son of former President Trump, disclosed in July 2025 that he had purchased 350,000 shares of Thumzup upon the recommendation of an investment advisor, with a value ranging approximately from $3.3 million to $4.3 million.
